snippet: A campaign to win support for Egypt’s new constitution got off to a rocky start when bloggers noticed that a banner promoting the document misspelled the word for “Egyptians” in Arabic and used stock images of foreigners.
abstract: A campaign to win support for Egypt’s new constitution got off to a rocky start when bloggers noticed that a banner promoting the document misspelled the word for “Egyptians” in Arabic and used stock images of foreigners.

headline.main: Egyptians Mock Ads Promoting New Constitution With Typos and Stock Images

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
